Department of English

Our Department has an essential responsibility for improving student's communicative Skills in English Language. It takes an effort to promote their creative writing and provides them a chance to study many literatures of other countries through English language. Students are introduced to read many literary genres and they learn to appreciate literature. As they study leterature of Africa, Australia, India and so on., they are familiarized with the culture of those countries. The department takes a pivotal role in enhancing student's spoken and written communication without any grammatical mistakes. Through Literary Assosiation of the Department, Students develop their extra curricular activities also. Language Lab also be much useful for improving their Communicative Skills.
